title: Wolf (Wolf) and Lamb (Lamm) (in-text plates, page 12) from Tierfabeln des Aesop (Aesop's Fables)
medium: Two from an illustrated book with thirty-five woodcuts (including woodcut cover, title page and ornamental initials)
dimensions: composition (Wolf, irreg.): 2 1/16 x 3 3/8" (5.3 x 8.6 cm); composition (lamb, irreg.): 1 13/16 x 1 7/8" (4.6 x 4.8 cm); page: 13 x 9 1/16" (33 x 23 cm)
